notes: Successive attacks with Grove Bow do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Works against every unit, including wards, buildings and allied units.
Reduces most heroes' total magic resistance to 16%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
abilities.description: Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 12%

info: The attack range bonus works for ranged heroes only.
Attack range bonuses from multiple Grove Bows do not stack.
Stacks with all other attack range bonuses.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.
